local_intent: Perceive the plate and move to a pre-place pose above it during transfer, confirming arrival.
assumptions: Bread is already held in the gripper
Plate pose becomes available after perception
Path to above-plate pose is reachable
coherence_with_global: Implements the MoveAbove(target=plate, offset_z=0.08, timeout_ms=1500) step with a visibility/scan fallback and arrival check, matching the global transfer phase.
